nodes.text: Make Your Own Pop-Up Book: Ghoul-actic Halloween
Star Wars: Make Your Own Pop-Up Book: Ghoul-actic Halloween is a canon pop-up book published by Insight Editions on July 13, 2021.

Explore the dark side of the most haunted of holidays with Star Wars: A Ghoul-actic Halloween Pop-Up Book. Step-by-step instructions guide readers to construct and color holiday-themed 3D pop-ups. Each pop-up is easy and fun to build, from Sith-style pumpkins to a collection of Porgs that trick-or-squeak, this unique Halloween celebration is sure to give even the most serene Jedi a frightfully good time.
